about.title: About
about.licensesDescription: This application uses the following open source libraries:
about.depsDescription: Key dependencies used in this project:

home.title: To get started, edit the page.tsx file.
home.description: Looking for a starting point or more instructions? Head over to {templates} or the {learning} center.

fov.dragToPositionDesc: Enable dragging to reposition the FOV

observationLog.title: Observation Log
observationLog.desktopOnly: Observation log is only available in the desktop app

observationLog.newSessionDesc: Start a new observation session for tonight.
observationLog.addObsDesc: Record an observation for this session.
observationLog.obsNotesPlaceholder: What did you observe? Details, impressions...

exposure.calculatorDescription: Calculate optimal exposure settings for your target

cache.downloadAllDescription: Download all layers for offline use ({size})
cache.clearAllCacheDescription: This will remove all cached data ({size}). You will need to re-download for offline use.

skyAtlas.title: Sky Atlas
skyAtlas.emptyState: Click Search to find deep sky objects

credits.gaiaDescription: This work has made use of data from the European Space Agency (ESA) mission Gaia, processed by the Gaia Data Processing and Analysis Consortium (DPAC).
credits.hipparcosDescription: The Hipparcos star catalog from ESA (European Space Agency) and the Hipparcos mission.
credits.simbadDescription: SIMBAD astronomical database, operated at CDS, Strasbourg
credits.dssDetails2: Based on DSS2-red and DSS2-blue HiPS surveys from original scanned plates
credits.planetTexturesDescription: High-resolution planet textures from Stellarium Labs under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
credits.planetTexturesSource: Original data from NASA & JPL under public domain license
credits.minorPlanetsDescription: All data comes from the IAU Minor Planet Center. This research has made use of data and/or services provided by the International Astronomical Union's Minor Planet Center.

markers.deleteMarkerDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
markers.clearAllDescription: This will remove all {count} markers. This action cannot be undone.
markers.noMarkersHint: Right-click on the sky to add a marker
markers.name: Name

ocular.overMagnifiedWarning: Magnification exceeds useful limit. Image may appear dim and blurry.
ocular.largePupilWarning: Exit pupil exceeds typical dark-adapted eye. Some light may be wasted.

satellites.noPasses: No passes in the next 24 hours
satellites.searchPlaceholder: Search by name or NORAD ID

dataManager.title: Data Manager
dataManager.description: Export, import, or clear your saved data including targets, markers, and settings.
dataManager.descriptionDesktop: Manage your locally stored data. Data is saved to your computer.
dataManager.descriptionWeb: Manage your browser stored data. Data is saved in localStorage.
dataManager.clearConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all your saved targets, markers, and settings. This action cannot be undone.

equipment.title: Equipment Manager
equipment.description: Manage your telescopes, cameras, and accessories
equipment.name: Name
equipment.addCameraDescription: Add a custom camera with your sensor specifications
equipment.addTelescopeDescription: Add a custom telescope with your optics specifications

map.useGpsLocation: Use GPS to detect your location
map.providerSettingsDescription: Configure map providers, fallback strategies, and caching options.
map.autoFallbackDescription: Automatically switch to backup provider on failure
map.cacheDescription: Cache geocoding results to reduce API calls
map.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Click Save to apply them.
map.apiKeyManagerDescription: Manage API keys for map providers. Keys are stored securely in local storage.
map.securityNoticeDescription: API keys are stored locally. Never share your API keys publicly.
map.addKeyHint: Add an API key to enable premium map features
map.deleteKeyDescription: This action cannot be undone. The API key will be permanently removed.
map.addApiKeyDescription: Add a new API key for a map provider.
map.label: Label

locationSearch.useGpsLocation: Use GPS to detect your location

sourceConfig.title: Information Sources
sourceConfig.configDescription: Configure image and data sources for celestial objects
sourceConfig.resetDescription: This will reset all sources and settings to their default values. Custom sources will be removed.
sourceConfig.deleteSourceDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
sourceConfig.addCustomDescription: Add a custom source for fetching images or data
sourceConfig.autoSkipOfflineDescription: Automatically skip sources that are detected as offline

welcome.title: Welcome to SkyMap
welcome.subtitle: Your personal window to the universe. Let us show you around!

explore.title: Explore the Sky
explore.description: Navigate the night sky in real-time

welcome.title: Welcome to the Star Map
welcome.description: This is your interactive view of the night sky. You can drag to pan around, scroll to zoom, and click on objects to learn more about them.

search.title: Search for Objects
search.description: Click here to search for stars, planets, galaxies, nebulae, and more. Try searching for 'M31' (Andromeda Galaxy) or 'Mars'.

navigation.title: Navigate the Sky
navigation.description: Drag with your mouse to pan around the sky. On touch devices, use one finger to drag. The view follows real celestial coordinates.

zoom.title: Zoom Controls
zoom.description: Use these controls to zoom in and out. You can also use your mouse wheel or pinch-to-zoom on touch devices. The FOV (field of view) is shown at the bottom.

settings.title: Settings Panel
settings.description: Access all settings here: display options, equipment configuration, FOV simulator, and more. Customize the view to match your preferences.

fov.title: FOV Simulator
fov.description: Visualize your camera's field of view on the sky. Configure your telescope and camera to see exactly what you'll capture in your images.

shotlist.title: Shot List
shotlist.description: Plan your imaging session by adding targets to your shot list. Track progress and manage your observation queue for the night.

tonight.title: Tonight's Picks
tonight.description: Get personalized recommendations for the best objects to observe tonight based on your location and current sky conditions.

contextmenu.title: Right-Click Menu
contextmenu.description: Right-click (or long-press on mobile) anywhere on the sky to access quick actions: add markers, copy coordinates, add to target list, and more.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: You've completed the tour. Explore the universe at your own pace! You can restart this tour anytime from the Settings menu.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your SkyMap
welcome.description: Complete a few quick steps to customize SkyMap for your needs. You can always change these settings later.

location.title: Observation Location
location.description: Set your geographic location for accurate sky views

equipment.title: Equipment Setup
equipment.description: Configure your telescope and camera for FOV simulation

preferences.title: Display Preferences
preferences.description: Customize the star map display to your liking

location.title: Location
location.subtitle: Set your observation location
location.description: Accurate location helps calculate rise/set times and optimal observation windows for celestial objects.
location.skipNote: You can skip this step and configure location later in Settings.
location.gpsNotSupported: GPS is not supported by your browser
location.permissionDenied: Location permission denied. Please allow in browser settings.
location.timeout: Location request timed out. Please try again.
location.unknownError: An unknown error occurred while getting location

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.subtitle: Configure your observation equipment
equipment.description: Set up your telescope and camera parameters to simulate field of view on the star map.
equipment.skipNote: You can skip this step and configure equipment later.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Customize your star map
preferences.description: Adjust display options to match your preferences. These can be changed anytime.
preferences.objectLanguageDesc: Choose the display language for constellation and star names
preferences.nightModeDesc: Red filter to preserve dark adaptation
preferences.tipMessage: Tip: You can change these options anytime in the Settings panel.

complete.title: All Done
complete.subtitle: You're all set!
complete.description: Basic setup is complete. You're ready to explore the night sky!
complete.tip1: Drag with mouse or finger to pan the sky view
complete.tip2: Use scroll wheel or pinch to zoom in/out
complete.tip3: Click on objects to see detailed information

theme.customizeDescription: Personalize the appearance of your star map
theme.fontPreviewText: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. 0123456789

plateSolving.title: Plate Solving
plateSolving.description: Upload an astronomical image to determine its sky coordinates using astrometry.net
plateSolving.apiKeyHint: Get your free API key at nova.astrometry.net
plateSolving.imageCaptureDesc: Upload an image or take a photo for plate solving
plateSolving.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 50MB
plateSolving.fitsInfo: FITS format detected - will be sent directly to solver

geolocation.title: Device Location
geolocation.permissionRequired: Location permission is required to use this feature
geolocation.notAvailable: Location services not available on this device
geolocation.mobileOnly: Location services are only available on mobile devices
geolocation.heading: Heading

general.languageDescription: Changes the language of the user interface

appearance.enableAnimationsDesc: Enable smooth transitions and animations throughout the app

performance.qualityLowDesc: Best for older devices or battery saving
performance.qualityUltraDesc: Maximum visual quality, may impact performance
performance.maxStarsDesc: Higher values show more stars but may reduce performance
performance.showFPSDesc: Display frames per second in the corner

accessibility.largeTextDesc: Increase text size throughout the app
accessibility.focusIndicatorsDesc: Show clear focus indicators for keyboard navigation

updater.title: Software Update
updater.description: Check for updates and keep your app up to date
updater.ready: Update downloaded and ready to install
updater.restartRequired: Restart required to complete the update
updater.autoUpdateDescription: Automatically check for updates on startup
